original_text: And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people, and blessed them, and came down from offering of the sin offering, and the burnt offering, and peace offerings.
korean_text: 아론이 백성을 향하여 손을 들어 축복함으로 속죄제와 번제와 화목제를 마치고 내려오니라

sentences.original_text: And Aaron lifted up his hand toward the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아론은 백성들을 향해 손을 들었고

sentences.original_text: and came down from offering of the sin offering
